searchLangs.name: Cosmetic Search Language
searchLangs.description: Languages you can use to search for cosmetics.

platform.name: Platform Icon
platform.description: Select the platform icon for the bot (e.g., PC, console).

privacy.name: Party Privacy
privacy.description: Default privacy setting for the party, such as public or private.

statusText.name: Status Message
statusText.description: Custom status messages the bot can display.

busy_status.name: Busy Status
busy_status.description: Shows if the bot is currently busy.

friends_count.name: Friends Count
friends_count.description: Total number of friends the bot has.

blocked_users_count.name: Blocked Users Count
blocked_users_count.description: Number of users blocked by the bot.

statusInterval.name: Status Message Interval
statusInterval.description: How often the status message changes, in seconds.

bpLevel.name: Battle Pass Level
bpLevel.description: The bot's cosmetic battle pass level.

extraOwners.name: Extra Owners
extraOwners.description: Additional users who have full command access.

admins.name: Admins
admins.description: Users with admin privileges for restricted commands.

whitelistUsers.name: Whitelist Users
whitelistUsers.description: Users allowed to run certain restricted commands.

blacklistUsers.name: Blacklist Users
blacklistUsers.description: Users who are restricted or banned from using the bot.

excludedAutoAddFriends.name: Excluded Auto Add Friends
excludedAutoAddFriends.description: Users excluded from being automatically added as friends.

otherBots.name: Other Bots
otherBots.description: Bots you don't own and want to ignore.

inviteTimeout.name: Invite Timeout
inviteTimeout.description: Cooldown period before the bot can be re-invited, in seconds.

maxBotsPerLobby.name: Max Bots Per Party
maxBotsPerLobby.description: Maximum number of bots allowed in a single party.

maxBotsPerLobbyWithOwner.name: Max Bots Per Party With Owner
maxBotsPerLobbyWithOwner.description: Maximum bots allowed in a single party when an owner is present.

maxBotsPerLobbyWithAdmin.name: Max Bots Per Party With Admin
maxBotsPerLobbyWithAdmin.description: Maximum bots allowed in a single party when an admin is present.

maxBotsPerLobbyWithWhitelistUser.name: Max Bots Per Party With Whitelist User
maxBotsPerLobbyWithWhitelistUser.description: Maximum bots allowed in a single party when a whitelisted user is present.

allowMatchmaking.name: Allow Matchmaking
allowMatchmaking.description: Enable or disable matchmaking with the bot.

leaveAfterMatchmaking.name: Leave After Matchmaking
leaveAfterMatchmaking.description: The bot leaves the party after matchmaking starts.

disableMatchmakingChecks.name: Disable Matchmaking Checks
disableMatchmakingChecks.description: Remove the matchmaking cooldown limit (max 5 matches per hour).

disablePlaylistChecks.name: Disable Game Mode Checks
disablePlaylistChecks.description: Allow the bot to play any game mode except ranked. Bot lobbies are not guaranteed in other modes.

disableJoinMessages.name: Disable Join Messages
disableJoinMessages.description: Turn off messages when joining a party.

sendFriendRequestOnJoinParty.name: Send Friend Request On Join Party
sendFriendRequestOnJoinParty.description: Send friend requests to all party members when the bot joins a party.

sendFriendRequestOnMemberJoinParty.name: Send Friend Request On Member Join Party
sendFriendRequestOnMemberJoinParty.description: Send a friend request to new members when they join the party.

runCommandsWithoutPrefix.name: Run Commands Without Prefix
runCommandsWithoutPrefix.description: Allow commands to be run without a prefix.

setCosmeticsWithoutCommands.name: Set Cosmetics Without Commands
setCosmeticsWithoutCommands.description: Set cosmetics by just typing their name in party chat, no command needed.

setCosmeticsWithPrefix.name: Set Cosmetics With Prefix
setCosmeticsWithPrefix.description: Set cosmetics using a prefix, like !floss.

acceptInvites.name: Accept Invites
acceptInvites.description: Automatically accept party invites and join requests.

onlyOwnerCommands.name: Owner Commands
onlyOwnerCommands.description: Commands only bot owners can use.

onlyAdminCommands.name: Admin Commands
onlyAdminCommands.description: Commands only admins or owners can use.

onlyWhitelistUsersCommands.name: Whitelist User Commands
onlyWhitelistUsersCommands.description: Commands for whitelisted users, admins, or owners only.

onlyFriendsCommands.name: Friends-Only Commands
onlyFriendsCommands.description: Commands only available to the bot's friends.

onlyPartyMembersCommands.name: Party Members-Only Commands
onlyPartyMembersCommands.description: Commands only available to current party members.

onlyWhisperCommands.name: DM-Only Commands
onlyWhisperCommands.description: Commands that must be sent via whisper/DM.

startOutfit.name: Start Outfit
startOutfit.description: Default outfit(s) when the bot starts.

startBackpack.name: Start Backpack
startBackpack.description: Default backpack(s) when the bot starts.

startPickaxe.name: Start Pickaxe
startPickaxe.description: Default pickaxe(s) when the bot starts.

startShoes.name: Start Shoes
startShoes.description: Default shoes when the bot starts.

startBanner.name: Start Banner
startBanner.description: Default banner(s) when the bot starts.

startBannerColor.name: Start Banner Color
startBannerColor.description: Default banner color(s) when the bot starts.

joinOutfit.name: Join Outfit
joinOutfit.description: Outfit(s) to wear when joining a party.

joinBackpack.name: Join Backpack
joinBackpack.description: Backpack(s) to wear when joining a party.

joinPickaxe.name: Join Pickaxe
joinPickaxe.description: Pickaxe(s) to use when joining a party.

joinEmote.name: Join Emote
joinEmote.description: Emote(s) to perform when joining a party.

joinShoes.name: Join Shoes
joinShoes.description: Shoes to wear when joining a party.

joinBanner.name: Join Banner
joinBanner.description: Banner(s) to set when joining a party.

joinBannerColor.name: Join Banner Color
joinBannerColor.description: Banner color(s) to set when joining a party.

memberJoinOutfit.name: Member Join Outfit
memberJoinOutfit.description: Outfit(s) to set when a member joins the party.

memberJoinBackpack.name: Member Join Backpack
memberJoinBackpack.description: Backpack(s) to set when a member joins the party.

memberJoinPickaxe.name: Member Join Pickaxe
memberJoinPickaxe.description: Pickaxe(s) to set when a member joins the party.

memberJoinEmote.name: Member Join Emote
memberJoinEmote.description: Emote(s) to set when a member joins the party.

memberJoinShoes.name: Member Join Shoes
memberJoinShoes.description: Shoes to set when a member joins the party.

memberJoinBanner.name: Member Join Banner
memberJoinBanner.description: Banner(s) to set when a member joins the party.

memberJoinBannerColor.name: Member Join Banner Color
memberJoinBannerColor.description: Banner color(s) to set when a member joins the party.
